pkgmetadata.longdescription: Succinct and Correct Statistical Summaries for Reports // Succinctly and correctly format statistical summaries of various models and tests (F-test, Chi-Sq-test, Fisher-test, T-test, and rank-significance). The main purpose is unified reporting of experimental results, working around issue such as the difficulty of extracting model summary facts (such as with 'lm'/'glm'). This package also includes empirical tests, such as bootstrap estimates.
